responses.rationale: The segment provides factual corrections to numbers; it does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states facts about spread and detection numbers; it does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports a factual finding about milk samples; it does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual actions taken (restriction, testing); it does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states a factual percentage of cases that were fatal; the risk-adjective 'fatal' is not modified by an intensifier or comparative.
